title: About Wooxy
body:
My question is can i get banned if i use Wooxy. because i plan on doing it to change my font to the Korean one (its looks a lot nicer)

Wooxy is a third party program that DOES NOT alter the game or give game advantages,cheats and such

Its used to change skins. Map Skins,Champ Skins,Huds and Fonts. THAT ONLY YOU CAN SEE

So it has to be legal right ?? I don't see any trouble about it

But i beg a Rioter to answer my post just to be a 100% sure if i'm allowed or not to use it

replies.body:
Riot has said this about wooxy, but i don't feel like looking for the thread, u can search it yourself.


You can use it, more than likely you wont be banned, BUT like using any 3rd party program, you can be banned.



How they handle those bans idk.



I assume there's some automated system that detects altered files or something? idk
Wait so.....I can use it because it doesn't give an advantage....But in the same time i can't because that's a 3rd party program ??? I'm kinda confused

It all depends if you trust the developer of Wooxy or not.

Pretty sure he had a falling out with the mapskins community, but he's still developing the Wooxy app. Is it safe? It was. Is it still safe? Probably. Assuming he hasn't added any malicious code to it.

Your best bet if you want a solid answer is to send a ticket into [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Honestly, I don't think changing my font is worth even the slightest risk of getting banned, but that's just my opinion.
